          <title>
            <string language="en">Weathering of a rock by wind-blown sand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weathering eines Felsens durch 
Wind-durchgebrannten Sand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Désagrégation d'une roche par le sable 
vent-soufflé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Weathering de uma rocha pela areia vento-fundida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Weathering di una roccia dalla sabbia 
vento-saltata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάβρωση ενός βράχου από τη μεταδιδόμενη μέσω του 
ανέμου άμμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desgaste por la acción atmosférica de una roca 
por la arena viento-soplada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a rock being worn away mainly at its base by wind-blown sand.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>

          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Felsen, der weg 
hauptsächlich an seiner Unterseite durch Wind-durchgebrannten Sand 
getragen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une roche étant 
portée loin principalement à sa base par le sable vent-soufflé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma rocha que está sendo
desgastada afastado principalmente em sua base pela areia 
vento-fundida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una roccia che è 
portata via pricipalmente alla relativa base dalla sabbia 
vento-saltata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν βράχο που φοριέται 
μακριά κυρίως στη βάση της από τη μεταδιδόμενη μέσω του ανέμου 
άμμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una roca que es 
desgastada lejos principalmente en su base por la arena 
viento-soplada.</string>
          </description>
